page.title: 11Childrens' Games
page.content: a){Seasonal games}played on school playgrounds (Spring/Summer) "The farmer's in his den" "In and out the dusty bluebells" "The big ship sails" "I sent a letter to my love" b){Tag games } Sticky glue (or "releaso") British Bulldog Ball tag (Ball Touch) Hot Rice "What's the time, Mr. Wolf?" Off-ground tag (or "touch") Chain-tag "Hello Mrs. Crocodile" Stockings Some words of{singing circle games } 1."In and out the dusty bluebells (x2) You shall be my leader" 2."I sent a letter to my love,And on the way I lost it.It was not you,It was not me,And it was not in my pocket
